name: Shaking Asteroids
description:
Shaking Asteroids is an asteroid game where you must to avoid colliding with them. As the time progresses, a shaking animation will appear onto the screen, so it will add a difficulty layer to the game.

Controls
  • Arrow keys: move in the menus, change the options value
  • Enter key: Accept, change the options value
  • Return, Esc keys: Back to the main menu
  • W, A, S, D keys: move the ship
  • Q, E keys: rotate the ship
    Also you can rotate the ship with the mouse position
  • Space key: shoot
    Also, with the primary mouse button you can shoot
Credits
  • Sounds: Jonatan Galindo Alvarez (https://jonatangameaud.neocities.org/)
  • Programming and Design: Rafael Alcalde Azpiazu (https://twitter.com/nekerafa_dev)

WARNING: Epilepsy

A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a television screen or when playing video games may trigger epileptic seizures or blackouts in these individuals. If you, or anyone in your family has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing.

NOTE: This game was made in my personal Twitch account. You can check the development of the game on the following channel (spanish only): https://www.twitch.tv/nekerafa
